text:
Hi, will anyone know why custom tokens don't work for hubdb?
```{% set cartable = hubdb_table_rows( module.hubdbtable_field )%}
{% set car = cartable|selectattr('name','equalto', contact.porche_carrera ) %}```
the value returned by the token is the same as in the name column

Thanks
set your contact token as a variable seperately and it should work.
